USE Endpoint Creation

A USE endpoint is an endpoint that is accessible via any request. The server.use() function takes two arguments: the endpoint to which youâ€™d like to assign a USE request, and a callback. An example of a USE endpoint creation can be found below:

server.use("/use", async (req, res) => {
    res.statusCode = 200;
    res.end("USE request!");
});
